completion: All you need are some sample product images. Professional shots are not required. These can be simple photos taken with your phone or provided by customers. Just upload them along with some text describing what you’d like to see, and we’ll take care of the rest!

prompt: Do you provide image editing services?
completion: Editing tools are included in our platform, but if you require additional editing services, feel free to reach out to us at hello@booth.ai.

prompt: Are Booth AI images delivered ready for use?
completion: Yes! We provide high-resolution (4k) images that are ready for use on your website or in marketing materials.
